Now, translating this into Fortran:

program main

implicit none

integer :: t, i, j, n, m

integer(8) :: ans

integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: nums, results

read*, t

allocate(nums(t))

read*, nums(1:t)

allocate(results(t)) do i =1, t

    n = nums(i) if (n >2) then

        m = n-2

    else

        m =0

    end if

    ans =0

    do j=1, m

        temp = m /j

        term = j * temp * (temp +1)/2

        ans = ans + term

    end do

    results(i) = ans

end do

do i=1, t

    print*, results(i)

end do

end program

program main

implicit none

integer :: t, i, j, n, m

integer(8) :: ans

integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: nums, results

read*, t

allocate(nums(t))

read*, nums(1:t)

allocate(results(t))

do i =1, t

    n = nums(i)

    if (n >2) then

        m = n-2

    else

        m =0

    end if

    ans =0

    do j=1, m

        temp = m /j

        term = j * temp * (temp +1)/2

        ans = ans + term

    end do

    results(i) = ans

end do

do i=1, t

    print*, results(i)

end do

end program

The code:

program main

implicit none

integer :: t, i, j, n, m

integer(8) :: ans, temp, term

integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: nums, results

! Read the first input: t followed by t numbers

read*, t

allocate(nums(t))

read*, nums(1:t)

allocate(results(t))

do i =1, t

    n = nums(i)

    if (n > 2) then

        m = n - 2

    else

        m = 0

    end if

    ans = 0_8

    do j = 1, m

        temp = m / j

        term = j * temp * (temp + 1) / 2

        ans = ans + term

    end do

    results(i) = ans

end do

! Output all results

do i =1, t

    print*, results(i)

end do

deallocate(nums, results)

end program main
